mapper.select: SELECT * FROM adjustmentdetail WHERE employeeID = #{employeeID} AND year = #{year}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO adjustmentdetail (employeeID, employeeEmail, year, uploadStatus, adjustmentStatus, insertDate, updateDate) VALUES (#{employeeID}, #{employeeEmail}, #{year}, #{uploadStatus}, #{adjustmentStatus}, #{insertDate}, #{updateDate})
